summary: The BuildRequest requires changing the Pro upgrade button text from 'Please log in to upgrade' to 'Pay $20 to upgrade'. The diff shows modifications to ProFeaturesModal.tsx and ProUpgrade.tsx, but the actual button text change is not visible in the truncated diff content. The diff shows error toast messages with 'Please log in to upgrade' text, but no evidence of the replacement text 'Pay $20 to upgrade' as a call-to-action button label.

missing_requirements.requirement: Change the Pro upgrade call-to-action text from 'Please log in to upgrade' to 'Pay $20 to upgrade'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows error toast messages containing 'Please log in to upgrade' text in both ProFeaturesModal.tsx and ProUpgrade.tsx, but the truncated content does not show any button or call-to-action element displaying 'Pay $20 to upgrade'. The visible content shows price display ($20) and subscription information, but not the specific button text change required.
